profile:
CORE is Vancouverâ€™s leading floor and resurfacing company. We combine industry leading surface coating products, experience and dedication to deliver the absolute best flooring solutions for your project. From large industrial complexes to residential garages we can handle floor surfacing projects of any size.

We offer several flooring and re-surfacing solutions including solid epoxy, rubber and polyaspartic coatings. We can help you choose which coating will offer the best solution for your project. We always offer free quotes for projects of any size.

Contact us today to see how we can help turn your dream floor into a reality.

We are OPEN for business during COVID-19. Our technicians will use proper social distancing measures while performing service work.
We can do digital meetings for quotes if requested. You have the option to pay over the phone.
specialities:
Garage Floors
Shop Floors
Sidewalks and Patios
Decks
Commercial Floors
Industrial Floors
Swimming Pools
warranty_terms: Our Polyaspartic floor coating comes with a 20 year manufacturer backed warranty

profile:
We specialize in flooring & floor levelling, custom carpentry, baseboards, crown moldings, door & window casings, window liners, all types of trim & molding's, installing doors & closet doors, windows, decks, patios, kitchen cabinets, bathroom vanity's, shelving and so much more!  
No Job to big or small!
Riccas Contracting Ltd is company you can trust to do the job right, and to go above and beyond to ensure high quality workmanship! We take pride in what we do, and thrive for satisfied returning customers!
Contact us to get your project done with perfection!
services: floor installations & removal, interior finishing, custom carpentry, trim & mouldings, deck builds & repairs, door & window installations, siding, much much more!
